mapper.insert: insert into org(orgid, orgpw, orgname, orgcategory, logo, orgphone, ceoname, orgzipcode, orgaddr, orgaddrdetail, orgaddretc) values(#{orgid},#{orgpw},#{orgname}, #{orgcategory}, #{logo},#{orgphone},#{ceoname}, #{orgzipcode},#{orgaddr},#{orgaddrdetail},#{orgaddretc})
mapper.select: select orgname from org where orgid=#{orgid}
